name: Card Hunter
summary:
Card Hunter is a browser-based flash game that combines elements of a digital collectible card game with a table-top board game.
The game is developed by Blue Manchu Games headed by Irrational Games co-founder, Jon Chey. The development team also consists of other former Irrational Games and Looking Glass Studios employees, as well as consultants who previously worked on Magic: The Gathering. It was initially released as a web-browser based game in September 2013, with a standalone client released for Microsoft Windows and OS X in July 2015.
info:
• 中文名: 卡片猎人
  • 平台: Web browser
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: CCG and tabletop hybrid
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2013年9月12日
  • 开发: Blue Manchu
  • 发行: Blue Manchu
